Reviews.Title: Favorite 'pocket' camera
Reviews.Author: Czechchick
Reviews.Content: OK, I admitt that I was swayed by the touch screen and slide-cover, 12 megapixels, the FUJI name ( I own the S1800 slr, 18x zoom )and wanted a camera that would fit in my purse or pocket to always have on hand. It is so intuitive to use and the auto features help me, a non techy photographer ( although I am learning by leaps and bounds now)....great photos, easy uploading to the internet. It has become my FAV. OK, I love the metalic soft pink color too! I am blessed.I am thrilled to own this camera and paid more for it too.

Reviews.Title: sue102250
Reviews.Author: Sue Pearson
Reviews.Content: LOVE the camera.  The touch screen is great.  Get beautiful photos and it's real easy to use.  LOVE the pink camera!!

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix Z800EXR 12 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Mylo
Reviews.Content: Best camera I've owned, I've had this camera for about 6 months.. I am so happy with this product and all of its features.

ProductInfo.Features:
12-megapixel resolution with EXR technology; Fujinon 5x Zoom
3.5-inch wide (16:9) touch-screen LCD
HD movies at 720p with sound
Hybrid High Speed AF; Intelligent Image Stabilization
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix Z800EXR 12 MP Digital Camera with 5x Periscopic Optical Zoom and 3.5-Inch Touch-Screen LCD (Pink)
